name: Gaia, Inc.
description: Gaia, Inc. is a digital media and streaming company focused on delivering transformative and conscious content aimed at enhancing the mind, body, and spirit. Founded in 1988, Gaia has evolved from a traditional magazine publisher into a leading online subscription service that offers a vast library of films, documentaries, and original series centered around topics such as yoga, meditation, spirituality, and holistic health. The company’s mission is to empower individuals to explore their consciousness and to foster personal growth through the power of streaming media. With an extensive collection of over 8,000 videos and new content added regularly, Gaia serves a global audience of like-minded individuals seeking to deepen their understanding of themselves and the universe. Gaia also actively collaborates with thought leaders, authors, and filmmakers to produce high-quality, insightful content. As a pioneer in the conscious media space, Gaia is dedicated to creating a community that embraces alternative perspectives and practices for wellness and enlightenment.

seo.meta_title: Gaia, Inc. | Transformational Streaming for Mind, Body, and Spirit
seo.meta_description: Explore Gaia, Inc., a leader in conscious media and streaming. Discover transformative content that empowers your mind, body, and spirit.

faq.question: What is Gaia known for?
faq.answer: Gaia is known for its extensive library of transformative streaming content focused on yoga, meditation, and spirituality.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Gaia?
faq.answer: Jirka Rysavy is the CEO of Gaia, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Gaia headquartered?
faq.answer: Gaia is headquartered in Louisville, Colorado, USA.

faq.question: What type of content does Gaia offer?
faq.answer: Gaia offers documentaries, original series, yoga classes, and meditation practices.
